org.openhab.binding.smhi.internal

Class SmhiBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.events.AbstractEventSubscriber
      • org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractBinding<P>
        • org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractActiveBinding<SmhiBindingProvider>
          • org.openhab.binding.smhi.internal.SmhiBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openhab.core.binding.BindingChangeListener, org.openhab.core.events.EventSubscriber, org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService, org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler

    public class SmhiBinding
extends org.openhab.core.binding.AbstractActiveBinding<SmhiBindingProvider>
implements org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService
    The SMHI binding Refresh Service polls weather data from the SMHI servers with a fixed interval and posts a new event of type (DecimalType to the event bus. The interval is 10 minutes.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Mattias Markehed
